# pymcversion

## Install

```shell
pip3 install git+https://github.com/aoirint/pymcversion.git
```

## Command Usage

```shell
$ mcversion bedrock-server
1.17.40.06

$ mcversion java
1.17.1

$ mcversion ios
1.17.40
```

## Develop

```shell
pip3 install -r requirements.txt
```

## Run tests

```shell
pip3 install -r requirements-test.txt

make test
```
